title: Set classpath / output location should be one operation
OB: When pressing Ok after setting the output location, the following error message is displayed: 'Cannot nest output folder /xy in source folder /xy/src'. The problem is that setting the output location and classpath are currently two separate operations. By setting the output location first, an illegal state is created.
EB: To resolve this issue, the process of setting the classpath and output location should be combined into one operation. Similar to the validation process, where classpath and output location are checked simultaneously, the setting of classpath and output location should be offered as one operation. Additionally, the error message should be modified to say: '/xy/src' cannot be nested in '/xy'.
